our reality.

Pandemonium's influence.

responsible for creating Pandemonium—and
maintaining it.

実行しているだけなのだろう。

All the more reason to climb to the top and tear this
place down.

俺たちの勝ちってわけだ。

engSearchText: Van!

jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……！

engSearchText: Wh-What's wrong? Are you hurt?!

I'm fine. This is just a sign that we're closin' in on the
root issue of this whole thing.

ああ──“元凶”に
近付いてるってだけだろう。
……っ…………

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.
jpnChrName: ハッ……
jpnSearchText: ハッ……
………………………

engSearchText:
You're being so vague. Can't you just fill us in on
what we're missing?

jpnSearchText: だから何なのよ、その──……

engSearchText: Sorry, but doin' that would just muddy the waters.

jpnSearchText:
悪い──あんまり
混乱させたくないんでな。

engSearchText:
There's only one thing you need to know: the cause of
all our problems—and the truth behind what's
happening—is waitin' for us up above.

jpnSearchText:
だがこの上には全ての真実……
今回の異変の“大元”が待っている。

engSearchText: And I gotta get there—no matter what it takes.
jpnChrName: 俺はそこに行かなくちゃならねぇ。
jpnSearchText: 俺はそこに行かなくちゃならねぇ。

engSearchText:
But I realize I can't do that alone. So please...give me
a hand.

jpnSearchText:
だから頼む──
お前らの力を貸してくれ。
あ…………

engChrName: Did you just ask us for OUR help?
engSearchText: Did you just ask us for OUR help?
jpnChrName: てめえが頼む……だと？
jpnSearchText: てめえが頼む……だと？
…………………………

engSearchText:
Our debt-obsessed leader is pleading for our aid?
Hah! Hell must be freezing over.

jpnSearchText:
フフ、あれだけ貸し借りを
渋っていたのにね。

engSearchText:
For real. You're finally letting us repay what we
owe you. I truly never thought I'd see the day.

jpnSearchText:
うん……僕たち助手には
与えるばかりで返させもせずに。

engSearchText: I didn't, either. It makes me so happy.

jpnSearchText:
嬉しいですっ……
わたしたちを頼ってくれて。

engSearchText:
Me as well. I was beginning to believe I would never
hear those words from you.

jpnSearchText:
ええ──
その言葉を待っていました。

engChrName: Too bad they come at a hefty price. You're gonna have to pay us back a thousand times over.
engSearchText:
Too bad they come at a hefty price. You're gonna
have to pay us back a thousand times over.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、折角だから 千倍にして返してもらおうか？
jpnSearchText:
ヘッ、折角だから
千倍にして返してもらおうか？

engChrName: You little...! Heh. Fine. But I ain't settlin' for any more than double.
engSearchText:
You little...! Heh. Fine. But I ain't settlin' for any
more than double.
jpnChrName: ってオイ！ ──ま、せいぜい倍返しだ。
jpnSearchText:
ってオイ！
──ま、せいぜい倍返しだ。

engChrName: Heheh.
engSearchText: Heheh.
jpnChrName: フフ……
jpnSearchText: フフ……

engChrName: Don't worry. We're not asking for anything in return. ...But we do have one condition:
engSearchText:
Don't worry. We're not asking for anything in return.
...But we do have one condition:
jpnChrName: あはは……そんなにいりませんよ。 でも──
jpnSearchText:
あはは……そんなにいりませんよ。
でも──

engChrName: We will give you a hand IF you let us help you the entire way through.
engSearchText:
We will give you a hand IF you let us help you the
entire way through.
jpnChrName: 私たちは最後まで ヴァンさんに付いていきます。
jpnSearchText:
私たちは最後まで
ヴァンさんに付いていきます。

engChrName: You have many wonderful friends in your corner and powerful allies to call on...
engSearchText:
You have many wonderful friends in your corner and
powerful allies to call on...
jpnChrName: だからどうか自分一人で 片付けようとは思わないで下さい。
jpnSearchText:
だからどうか自分一人で
片付けようとは思わないで下さい。

engChrName: ...but you often throw caution to the wind all the same. Can you promise us that you won't do that this time?
engSearchText:
...but you often throw caution to the wind all
the same. Can you promise us that you won't do that
this time?
jpnChrName: さっきみたいな事は駄目ですよ？
jpnSearchText: さっきみたいな事は駄目ですよ？
っ……

engChrName: Okay. It's a promise.
engSearchText: Okay. It's a promise.
jpnChrName: ──ああ、約束する。
jpnSearchText: ──ああ、約束する。

engChrName: But I want you all to remember that we ain't heroes of justice. There's no shame in turnin' tail if things go to shit.
engSearchText:
But I want you all to remember that we ain't heroes
of justice. There's no shame in turnin' tail if things go
to shit.
jpnChrName: 俺たちは英雄じゃない──ヤバくなったら ケツまくって逃げりゃあいい。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちは英雄じゃない──ヤバくなったら
ケツまくって逃げりゃあいい。

engChrName: The fate of the world's important and all, but our lives are, too. We ain't gonna throw 'em away.
engSearchText:
The fate of the world's important and all, but our lives
are, too. We ain't gonna throw 'em away.
jpnChrName: 世界の命運なんかよりも てめえの命あっての物種だからな。
jpnSearchText:
世界の命運なんかよりも
てめえの命あっての物種だからな。

engSearchText:
Know your limits, and don't worry about what's black
or white. That's the spriggan creed, and we're gonna
follow it like always.

jpnSearchText:
白黒付けない裏解決屋（スプリガン）らしく
無理せずクールにケリを付けてやろう。

engChrName: So here's the plan: we're gonna kick Almata and the Gardens' sorry asses.
engSearchText:
So here's the plan: we're gonna kick Almata and the
Gardens' sorry asses.
jpnChrName: まずはアルマータと庭園の連中──
jpnSearchText: まずはアルマータと庭園の連中──

engChrName: They may be back with a vengeance, but we've beaten 'em all once. We can do it again.
engSearchText:
They may be back with a vengeance, but we've beaten
'em all once. We can do it again.

jpnSearchText:
蘇ったのも含めて待ち受けてるだろうが
しょせん一度は倒している相手だ。

engSearchText:
After that, we're gonna settle the score with Melchior
and Dantès—once and for all!

jpnSearchText:
とっととブチのめしてメルキオルと
ジェラールに落とし前を付けさせるぞ！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: おおっ！
jpnSearchText: おおっ！

engSearchText: Elaine left the party.

jpnSearchText: 来たね──裏解決屋（スプリガン）。

the dead.

business, then!

押し通らせてもらいますっ……！

with this new power, I can't lose!

me to rot in that cell!

jpnSearchText:
イシュタンティ──
モード《怒りの日（ディエス＝イレ）》。

engChrName: You shall be embraced by wings of mercy and laid to eternal rest in a garden of gold.
engSearchText:
You shall be embraced by wings of mercy and laid to
eternal rest in a garden of gold.
jpnChrName: 慈悲を与える翼に抱かれ、 黄金の園に眠るといいでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
慈悲を与える翼に抱かれ、
黄金の園に眠るといいでしょう。

engChrName: Here we go!
engSearchText: Here we go!
jpnChrName: 来る……！
jpnSearchText: 来る……！

engChrName: Be wary of the distance between yourselves and them!
engSearchText: Be wary of the distance between yourselves and them!
jpnChrName: 人形と短針銃…… 間合いと連携に気をつけよ！
jpnSearchText:
人形と短針銃……
間合いと連携に気をつけよ！

engChrName: You ain't puttin' us to sleep, angel girl. You're the one's who'll be enjoyin' a nice, long nap!
engSearchText:
You ain't puttin' us to sleep, angel girl. You're the
one's who'll be enjoyin' a nice, long nap!
jpnChrName: 悪いが、眠るのはお前らだ──！
jpnSearchText: 悪いが、眠るのはお前らだ──！

engChrName: Ishtanti's output is decreasing...
engSearchText: Ishtanti's output is decreasing...
jpnChrName: イシュタンティの出力低下……
jpnSearchText: イシュタンティの出力低下……

engChrName: I don't understand. There is this emotion that's welling up from inside me. I think it's...frustration?
engSearchText:
I don't understand. There is this emotion that's
welling up from inside me. I think it's...frustration?
jpnChrName: 何故でしょう……ここに至って 少し“悔しく”なってきました……
jpnSearchText:
何故でしょう……ここに至って
少し“悔しく”なってきました……

engChrName: Really?
engSearchText: Really?
jpnChrName: そう、ですか……
jpnSearchText: そう、ですか……

engChrName: I'm glad you were able to recover that emotion.
engSearchText: I'm glad you were able to recover that emotion.
jpnChrName: ……それも貴女自身が 手に入れたものでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
……それも貴女自身が
手に入れたものでしょう。

engChrName: Rest well. I pray that you will be at the Goddess' side when next you wake.
engSearchText:
Rest well. I pray that you will be at the Goddess' side
when next you wake.
jpnChrName: ゆっくりお休みください。 ──願わくば女神の下へ。
jpnSearchText:
ゆっくりお休みください。
──願わくば女神の下へ。

engChrName: Really?
engSearchText: Really?
jpnChrName: そうですか……
jpnSearchText: そうですか……

engChrName: I'm glad you were able to recover that emotion.
engSearchText: I'm glad you were able to recover that emotion.
jpnChrName: それこそ貴女自身が 手に入れたものでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
それこそ貴女自身が
手に入れたものでしょう。

engChrName: Rest well. I sincerely hope that, one day, you can begin to take even more steps forward.
engSearchText:
Rest well. I sincerely hope that, one day, you can
begin to take even more steps forward.
jpnChrName: ゆっくりお休みください。 ──いずれ歩み出す時のために。
jpnSearchText:
ゆっくりお休みください。
──いずれ歩み出す時のために。

engChrName: Haha... The probability of that is close to zero, I'm afraid.
engSearchText:
Haha... The probability of that is close to zero,
I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: ………ふふ………… 流石にそれはあり得ないかと……
jpnSearchText:
………ふふ…………
流石にそれはあり得ないかと……

engChrName: ...I have to go now. Farewell, everyone. And...thank you, Risette.
engSearchText:
...I have to go now. Farewell, everyone. And...thank
you, Risette.
jpnChrName: それでは失礼します…… ……裏解決屋にリゼット嬢………
jpnSearchText:
それでは失礼します……
……裏解決屋にリゼット嬢………

engChrName: Haha. That's wishful thinking, I'm afraid. I cannot imagine that day will ever come.
engSearchText:
Haha. That's wishful thinking, I'm afraid. I cannot
imagine that day will ever come.
jpnChrName: ………ふふ………… そんな日が訪れるとも思えませんが……
jpnSearchText:
………ふふ…………
そんな日が訪れるとも思えませんが……

engChrName: Regardless, I will accept my defeat with grace. It's time I return to my shackles and live out my sentence.
engSearchText:
Regardless, I will accept my defeat with grace.
It's time I return to my shackles and live out
my sentence.
jpnChrName: ……改めて敗れた身…… 大人しく縛を受け入れましょう……
jpnSearchText:
……改めて敗れた身……
大人しく縛を受け入れましょう……

engChrName: *sigh* It's a pity that she only regained some of her humanity at the end. She was even a little charming.
engSearchText:
*sigh* It's a pity that she only regained some of her
humanity at the end. She was even a little charming.
jpnChrName: やれやれ……最期は ちょいと愛嬌を見せたじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……最期は
ちょいと愛嬌を見せたじゃないか。

engChrName: *sigh* It's a pity that she only regained some of her humanity at the end. She was even a little charming.
engSearchText:
*sigh* It's a pity that she only regained some of her
humanity at the end. She was even a little charming.
jpnChrName: やれやれ……最後は ちょいと愛嬌を見せたじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……最後は
ちょいと愛嬌を見せたじゃないか。

engChrName: Well, this is it. My time in this world is up.
engSearchText: Well, this is it. My time in this world is up.
jpnChrName: ま、あたしも そろそろ逝くとするよ……
jpnSearchText:
ま、あたしも
そろそろ逝くとするよ……

engChrName: Well, this is it. It's about time I return to my cell.
engSearchText: Well, this is it. It's about time I return to my cell.
jpnChrName: ま、あたしも そろそろ落ちるとするよ……
jpnSearchText:
ま、あたしも
そろそろ落ちるとするよ……

engChrName: Frankly, I don't give a rat's ass about Melchior, but do take care of the boss for me, if you would.
engSearchText:
Frankly, I don't give a rat's ass about Melchior, but do
take care of the boss for me, if you would.
jpnChrName: メルキオルのヤツはともかく…… ……ボスのことはよろしく頼んだ……
jpnSearchText:
メルキオルのヤツはともかく……
……ボスのことはよろしく頼んだ……

engChrName: Consider that a request—from me to you.
engSearchText: Consider that a request—from me to you.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋…… ……アンタへの依頼としてね……
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋……
……アンタへの依頼としてね……

engChrName: What?
engSearchText: What?
jpnSearchText: え……

engChrName: You're...actually giving us a request?
engSearchText: You're...actually giving us a request?
jpnChrName: それって……
jpnSearchText: それって……

engChrName: That ain't necessary. I was planning on doin' that anyway.
engSearchText:
That ain't necessary. I was planning on doin'
that anyway.
jpnChrName: 必要ねえ── 元々そのつもりだからな。
jpnSearchText:
必要ねえ──
元々そのつもりだからな。

engChrName: I can guarantee that I'll get the job done, though. Least I can do for someone who's on their way out.
engSearchText:
I can guarantee that I'll get the job done, though.
Least I can do for someone who's on their way out.
jpnChrName: だがせめてもの餞（はなむけ）だ、 言葉だけは受け取っておくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
だがせめてもの餞（はなむけ）だ、
言葉だけは受け取っておくぜ。

engChrName: But if you surrender yourself to judgment willingly, I'll give you my full guarantee that I'll get the job done.
engSearchText:
But if you surrender yourself to judgment willingly,
I'll give you my full guarantee that I'll get the
job done.
jpnChrName: だが大人しく裁きを受け入れるなら 言葉だけは受け取ってもいいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
だが大人しく裁きを受け入れるなら
言葉だけは受け取ってもいいぜ？

engChrName: Heh. That's good enough for me, I suppose.
engSearchText: Heh. That's good enough for me, I suppose.
jpnChrName: フフ……それでいい……
jpnSearchText: フフ……それでいい……

engChrName: Looking back, I led a shitty life—from start to finish. At least I had some fun at the end.
engSearchText:
Looking back, I led a shitty life—from start to finish.
At least I had some fun at the end.
jpnChrName: ……クソったれな人生だったが…… まあまあ……愉しかったねぇ………
jpnSearchText:
……クソったれな人生だったが……
まあまあ……愉しかったねぇ………

engChrName: Heheh. Not like I'm in a position to refuse.
engSearchText: Heheh. Not like I'm in a position to refuse.
jpnChrName: クク、足元見るじゃないか……
jpnSearchText: クク、足元見るじゃないか……

engChrName: Well, I can settle for that, I suppose. You watch your back while you're fighting him.
engSearchText:
Well, I can settle for that, I suppose. You watch
your back while you're fighting him.
jpnChrName: まあそれで手を打とうか…… ……せいぜい気をつけるんだね……
jpnSearchText:
まあそれで手を打とうか……
……せいぜい気をつけるんだね……

engChrName: Ugh. She didn't deserve the luxury of a peaceful death after all she did.
engSearchText:
Ugh. She didn't deserve the luxury of a peaceful death
after all she did.
jpnChrName: チッ……あんだけの事をやって 満足そうに逝きやがって……
jpnSearchText:
チッ……あんだけの事をやって
満足そうに逝きやがって……

engChrName: Ugh. Where does she get off, ordering us around? She has no right to be making demands.
engSearchText:
Ugh. Where does she get off, ordering us around?
She has no right to be making demands.
jpnChrName: チッ…… 条件付けられる身かっつーの。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……
条件付けられる身かっつーの。

engChrName: Aaron...
engSearchText: Aaron...
jpnChrName: アーロンさん……
jpnSearchText: アーロンさん……

engChrName: Still, it does feel like our words reached her in the end.
engSearchText:
Still, it does feel like our words reached her in
the end.
jpnChrName: ……でも少しは 届いたんじゃないでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
……でも少しは
届いたんじゃないでしょうか？

engChrName: True. Though that's not going to wipe away all the wrongs she's done.
engSearchText:
True. Though that's not going to wipe away all the
wrongs she's done.
jpnChrName: そうね…… 罪が消えるわけじゃないけど。
jpnSearchText:
そうね……
罪が消えるわけじゃないけど。

engChrName: More importantly, what was up with her request, Van?
engSearchText:
More importantly, what was up with her
request, Van?
jpnChrName: それより──……
jpnSearchText: それより──……

engChrName: Well, obviously it's about Dantès. He's up to somethin'...
engSearchText:
Well, obviously it's about Dantès. He's up
to somethin'...
jpnChrName: ま、ジェラールのヤツにも あれで色々あったってことだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ジェラールのヤツにも
あれで色々あったってことだ。

engChrName: ...and I'm pretty sure I know what. It's stuff that...I was indirectly involved in at one point.
engSearchText:
...and I'm pretty sure I know what. It's stuff that...I
was indirectly involved in at one point.
jpnChrName: そしてそれには間接的に 俺も関わっちまっている……
jpnSearchText:
そしてそれには間接的に
俺も関わっちまっている……

engChrName: Let's leave it at that for now. I think the rest'll become clear soon enough.
engSearchText:
Let's leave it at that for now. I think the rest'll
become clear soon enough.
jpnChrName: 今はその程度に思っててくれ。
jpnSearchText: 今はその程度に思っててくれ。

engChrName: ...All right.
engSearchText: ...All right.
jpnChrName: ……分かった。
jpnSearchText: ……分かった。

engChrName: We should move on. There's still a lot of tower left to climb.
engSearchText:
We should move on. There's still a lot of tower left
to climb.
jpnChrName: 今は先を急ごうか。 厄介な連中も残ってるしね。
jpnSearchText:
今は先を急ごうか。
厄介な連中も残ってるしね。

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: Oh, but before we move on, what should we do with her?
engSearchText:
Oh, but before we move on, what should we do
with her?
jpnChrName: そういえば彼女…… どうしましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば彼女……
どうしましょうか？

engChrName: Oh, but before we move on, what should we do with them?
engSearchText:
Oh, but before we move on, what should we do
with them?
jpnChrName: そういえば彼女たち…… どうしましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば彼女たち……
どうしましょうか？

engChrName: I believe restraint is necessary, at the very least.
engSearchText: I believe restraint is necessary, at the very least.
jpnChrName: 一応拘束しておこう。 また司直に引き渡すために。
jpnSearchText:
一応拘束しておこう。
また司直に引き渡すために。

engChrName: 'Sup. Glad you could make it.
engSearchText: 'Sup. Glad you could make it.
jpnChrName: よう、来たかよ裏解決屋（スプリガン）。
jpnSearchText: よう、来たかよ裏解決屋（スプリガン）。

engChrName: If you're here, then I can only assume Viola and Olympia have fallen.
engSearchText:
If you're here, then I can only assume Viola and
Olympia have fallen.
jpnChrName: ヴィオーラとオランピア殿を 下してきたようだな。
jpnSearchText:
ヴィオーラとオランピア殿を
下してきたようだな。

engChrName: Well, this is just great. Do we really gotta deal with both of you at the same time?
engSearchText:
Well, this is just great. Do we really gotta deal with
both of you at the same time?
jpnChrName: 今度はアンタらがまとめてかよ……
jpnSearchText: 今度はアンタらがまとめてかよ……

engChrName: So the old tin can and the soldier got revived, huh?
engSearchText: So the old tin can and the soldier got revived, huh?
jpnChrName: 甲冑野郎はともかく、 筋肉野郎もそんな感じとはな……
jpnSearchText:
甲冑野郎はともかく、
筋肉野郎もそんな感じとはな……

engChrName: So the old tin can got revived, and the soldier busted out of prison.
engSearchText:
So the old tin can got revived, and the soldier
busted out of prison.
jpnChrName: 甲冑野郎はともかく、 筋肉野郎は抜け出しやがったか。
jpnSearchText:
甲冑野郎はともかく、
筋肉野郎は抜け出しやがったか。

engChrName: Yes. Much like Viola, I was summoned back to this world from Gehenna. And quite forcefully, at that.
engSearchText:
Yes. Much like Viola, I was summoned back to this
world from Gehenna. And quite forcefully, at that.
jpnChrName: ああ、ヴィオーラ同様、 煉獄からおめおめ連れ戻された。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ヴィオーラ同様、
煉獄からおめおめ連れ戻された。

engChrName: Yes. Unlike Viola, I was summoned back to this world from Gehenna. And quite forcefully, at that.
engSearchText:
Yes. Unlike Viola, I was summoned back to this
world from Gehenna. And quite forcefully, at that.
jpnChrName: ああ、ヴィオーラとは違い、 煉獄からおめおめ連れ戻された。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ヴィオーラとは違い、
煉獄からおめおめ連れ戻された。

engChrName: Yes. Unlike Viola, I was brought here from my cell by forces beyond my control.
engSearchText:
Yes. Unlike Viola, I was brought here from my cell by
forces beyond my control.
jpnChrName: ああ、ヴィオーラとは違い、 拘置所より無様にも放たれた。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ヴィオーラとは違い、
拘置所より無様にも放たれた。

engChrName: Yes. Much like Viola, I was brought here from my cell by forces beyond my control.
engSearchText:
Yes. Much like Viola, I was brought here from my
cell by forces beyond my control.
jpnChrName: ああ、ヴィオーラ同様、 拘置所より無様にも放たれた。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ヴィオーラ同様、
拘置所より無様にも放たれた。

engChrName: Be that as it may, I have been given another chance to achieve glory on the battlefield. And I shall do so—by claiming your lives.
engSearchText:
Be that as it may, I have been given another chance to
achieve glory on the battlefield. And I shall do so—by
claiming your lives.
jpnChrName: だがこれも巡り合わせだろう。 最後に一花、咲かせるとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
だがこれも巡り合わせだろう。
最後に一花、咲かせるとしようか。

engChrName: I suppose they aren't in a chatty mood.
engSearchText: I suppose they aren't in a chatty mood.
jpnChrName: いきなりだね……！
jpnSearchText: いきなりだね……！

engChrName: Nope. Though it's not like we'd be able to talk them down anyway.
engSearchText:
Nope. Though it's not like we'd be able to talk them
down anyway.
jpnChrName: でも、この人たちに限って 問答は無用でしょう……！
jpnSearchText:
でも、この人たちに限って
問答は無用でしょう……！

engChrName: You got that right, kiddo.
engSearchText: You got that right, kiddo.
jpnChrName: クク、分かってんじゃねぇか ちっこいの。
jpnSearchText:
クク、分かってんじゃねぇか
ちっこいの。

engChrName: Thanks to the Fangs of Rahu, I lived waaay longer than any human should've. I was ready to accept the sweet kiss of death by the end of my run.
engSearchText:
Thanks to the Fangs of Rahu, I lived waaay longer
than any human should've. I was ready to accept the
sweet kiss of death by the end of my run.
jpnChrName: 《羅睺（ラゴウ）の牙》に生かされてた身、 いつ消えちまっても文句は無かったが。
jpnSearchText:
《羅睺（ラゴウ）の牙》に生かされてた身、
いつ消えちまっても文句は無かったが。

engChrName: But that don't mean I hafta pass up one last shot at severin' heads.
engSearchText:
But that don't mean I hafta pass up one last shot at
severin' heads.
jpnChrName: 修羅としてもう一度望まれてるんなら 乗らない手はないからなァ。
jpnSearchText:
修羅としてもう一度望まれてるんなら
乗らない手はないからなァ。

engChrName: I, too, have long considered myself a walking corpse.
engSearchText: I, too, have long considered myself a walking corpse.
jpnChrName: 自分も同じく死人のようなもの……
jpnSearchText: 自分も同じく死人のようなもの……

engChrName: I hoped that my defeat in the former capital would enlighten me to a new way of life, but alas, it did not.
engSearchText:
I hoped that my defeat in the former capital would
enlighten me to a new way of life, but alas, it did not.
jpnChrName: 古都でお前たちに敗れたものの、 やはり生きる意味は今更見出せまい。
jpnSearchText:
古都でお前たちに敗れたものの、
やはり生きる意味は今更見出せまい。

engChrName: I'm sorry, but I must ask that you indulge my selfishness once more. Show me your strength!
engSearchText:
I'm sorry, but I must ask that you indulge my
selfishness once more. Show me your strength!
jpnChrName: 勝手は承知だが胸を借りるぞ── 裏解決屋（スプリガン）、そして助手たちよ！
jpnSearchText:
勝手は承知だが胸を借りるぞ──
裏解決屋（スプリガン）、そして助手たちよ！

engChrName: Someone's eager for an ass-kicking. And I'm always happy to serve.
engSearchText:
Someone's eager for an ass-kicking. And I'm always
happy to serve.
jpnChrName: いいだろう…… 改めて引導を渡してやるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
いいだろう……
改めて引導を渡してやるぜ！

engChrName: Same here. I'm not about to lose to a death-happy scumbag!
engSearchText:
Same here. I'm not about to lose to a
death-happy scumbag!
jpnChrName: ええ──死人気取りの連中なんかに 意地でも負けてあげるもんですか！
jpnSearchText:
ええ──死人気取りの連中なんかに
意地でも負けてあげるもんですか！

engChrName: I've also got an overly eager fan here who's strayed from the light—and it's up to me to set him straight!
engSearchText:
I've also got an overly eager fan here who's strayed
from the light—and it's up to me to set him straight!
jpnChrName: 道を踏み外したファンの目を 今度こそ覚ましてあげるためにもね！
jpnSearchText:
道を踏み外したファンの目を
今度こそ覚ましてあげるためにもね！

engChrName: Heheheh. Good to see that fiery spirit hasn't faded one bit. Bring it on, lady!
engSearchText:
Heheheh. Good to see that fiery spirit hasn't faded
one bit. Bring it on, lady!
jpnChrName: ククク、相変わらずイイ女だ。 なら存分に相手を務めてもらおうか！
jpnSearchText:
ククク、相変わらずイイ女だ。
なら存分に相手を務めてもらおうか！

engChrName: The two of them excel in both physical strength and agility. They are formidable opponents, indeed!
engSearchText:
The two of them excel in both physical strength
and agility. They are formidable opponents, indeed!
jpnChrName: 双方共に圧倒的な質量に速度── 最大級の難敵かと思います！
jpnSearchText:
双方共に圧倒的な質量に速度──
最大級の難敵かと思います！

engChrName: Maybe, but we'll take 'em down all the same! Both the front and back lines are gonna have to pull their weight on this one!
engSearchText:
Maybe, but we'll take 'em down all the same!
Both the front and back lines are gonna have to pull
their weight on this one!
jpnChrName: 総力戦で撃破する……！ 前衛・後衛でフルに連携しろ！
jpnSearchText:
総力戦で撃破する……！
前衛・後衛でフルに連携しろ！

engChrName: We'll be countin' on your support, too, Master!
engSearchText: We'll be countin' on your support, too, Master!
jpnChrName: 師父（せんせい）も宜しく頼みます！
jpnSearchText: 師父（せんせい）も宜しく頼みます！
